question:
In context with the recently conducted Ex Eastern Bridge V, consider the following statements:
  1. It is a bilateral exercise involving the naval force.
  2. It involves the participation of India and Myanmar.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Ex Eastern Bridge V is a bilateral exercise involving air forces. It was conducted between 17th and 26th of October. The exercise will see the participation of MiG-29 jets in an international exercise for the first time. C-17 jets will also be involved from the Indian side. Â Statement 2 is incorrect: The bilateral exercise involves India and Oman. The Indian Air Force will engage with the Royal Air Force Oman/ RAFO. It was conducted at the Masirah Island of Oman. The island houses a military air base. In 2017, the exercise was held in Jamnagar of India.
